closed_reason: Created cmd/tk/cmd/update.go with Cobra command. Added all flags (title, description, notes, status, priority, type, owner, add-labels, remove-labels, acceptance, defer, external-ref, parent, manual, requires, awaiting, verdict, json). Used cmd.Flags().Changed() to track which flags were explicitly set. Added helper functions appendUnique and removeString. Routed update to Cobra in main.go switch.
description: Migrate update command to Cobra. Preserve all flags for updating tick fields.
title: Port update command to Cobra
